name: Cosmic Corruption
description:
After your starship encounters an unknown threat in an asteroid field, your ship is invaded and afflicted with an eldritch plague.  Surrounded by enemies, you must fight your way through hostile space and defeat the source of this otherworldly evil. But be warned, each shot you fire only brings your ship one step closer to being torn apart.

ARTG/CMPM Spring 2019: 

Taylor Fagundes

Hunter Lynch 

Angeleen Tan
